website_summaries.verdict: This large set of 24 tiles can upgrade the audio quality of an entire vocal booth or control.
pros: An ideal way to deal with echos in relatively large spaces such as band practice rooms and gymnasiums
The wedge panels minimize interference and diffuse mid- to low-frequency sound waves, and are made to last
They boast a high-end Noise Reduction Coefficient, which results in more sound absorption
cons: The tiles come compressed in a vacuum-sealed bag, and may take time to reform

customer_reviews.title: An ideal option for basic echo management on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to how well these work in empirical terms, but they do seem to have effectively mitigated the echo in my recording environment, which was previously just blank white walls in an apartment building. Visually speaking, I love these things, they’re my ideal shade of blue, and they’re infinitely more attractive then the awful textured wall paint you seem to find in every apartment. I’m probably going to buy more of these just for aesthetic reasons. You can’t really beat the price for these things either, they’re only 1” thick, but if you’re like me and just trying cover as much surface area as possible on a budget, these are a great and visually appealing option
customer_reviews.author: Emrys Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Relatively thin, but good enough for echo reduction.
customer_reviews.text: The panels are only 1" thick at the thickest. The listing is pretty clear about that, but some people have complained in other reviews about them not being very thick, but the listing is pretty clear about that. These are not the kinds of acoustic foam you would use to soundproof a room for a band rehearsal space or the like, they're meant to reduce echo for recording purposes, and as long as you have adequate coverage, they get the job done quite well. I was able to reduce the echo in my recording space to basically zero with these.
customer_reviews.author: HePB1vM43771iDg

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy and thin. Not very dense at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and thin. Not very dense at all compared to other foams I've purchased just here on amazon. They control the flutter in the room a little bit so I have to give them a few stars, but they also hate command strips. Plan on actually using spray adhesive or something if you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel White

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Came in compressed packaging. Took about a day to reach normal shape. Placed them outside to air out some chemical order, now completely gone. The squares are shaped well, even, and uniform. Would definitely recommend these for sound dampening.
customer_reviews.author: LA DIY

customer_reviews.title: How to attatch?
customer_reviews.text: Does not cancel sound but simple muffled the sound for transferring and bouncing back. Upon purchase i completely skipped over that it comes with no way to mount them, so i picked up double stick tape which doesn’t not have enough straight to hold them up even after going through 3 spools of them so i upped it with 3M VHB which doesn’t appear to stick since the cheap foam isn’t really a soft surface to stick to. last option was to get gorilla spray adhesive which absolutely does the job except if you don’t want to go the invasive option, probably sticky tack for posters will also work just a well, i assume.
customer_reviews.author: jlk42

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Good panels, came oddly packaged at first. Like a suction style space saver. When removed, each panel was thinner than a beer cap. However, just let them sit for about 2 days, and they were at the advertised 1” thickness. Not disappointed in the least. Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Lane Swarts

customer_reviews.title: and helped dull the higher-end sounds and echoes that would have otherwise ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this last-minute for an open mic in a brick-walled basement. Worked very well aesthetically, and helped dull the higher-end sounds and echoes that would have otherwise taken away from the performances.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wh8ite

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for our needs. Decor/Function
customer_reviews.text: We hadn’t completely finished putting them up yet in this photo BUT... Command Atrups worked great. There was a couple that were just slightly off size from the others but all in all manageable as far as making sure they were lined up and straight. When they arrived we let them loft out by our humidifier for about 4 days. Only one was thinner than the rest. Happy with the quality for the price. Good purchase for 15 y/o bedroom decor as functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: They’re a scam
customer_reviews.text: This package was filled with Asian roaches and infested my apartment. We called an exterminator who asked if they were large, round and black, like the kind indigenous to our region, but they were not. They were brown and skinny, so they were from possibly whatever packaging warehouse these soundproof foam squares were kept. Aside from that, they absorb virtually no sound and they have no adhesion. Complete trash.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Order earlier than necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Shape recovery process took a bit longer than expected, (roughly one and a half days) but the panels look good and work as acoustic panels. The price was better than others, (others were $20 for 12) and putting them up was fairly easy. The shipping was fast and there weren't many issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Reckless Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think i ever been so pissed i order a pack of 24 before which all came in a big box nicely put not smashed this next order i paid next day came to be smashed and pressed smelling like spray paint it’s been one week now and the foam is still smashed i put in water as more stated the paint die faded and it’s still smashed the worse foam ever very disappointed choose another seller
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Little off on size
customer_reviews.text: They aren't all the exact same size, there is about .5" of fluctuation on any side. So if you try to do a large wall with these, they won't be perfectly symmetrical
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Compression is great in some cases.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how compressed the panels were, but I followed the instructions that the seller provided and I was able to compare them with my old panels that i bought 3 years ago and was happy to see they were a perfect match. So when it arrives just find something to do during that time and they will be ready to be used. Thank you for the swift delivery. This is the best deal I have seen on here. MaKE that Purchase! But, if you find another deal. Give me a holla. JK. I will purchase again...if that other deal doesn't happen..fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good, but missing squares.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem is that I received only 12 out of 24 squares. Other than that, it’s kinda hard to stick these on any material. I tried spray adhesive, it worked the best but you have to be very careful from getting any adhesive on the front side of the panels. They would definitely not stay up if you’re planning on using double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Rifaat Kay

customer_reviews.title: they're super effective.
customer_reviews.text: My studio, which is completely unideal, low ceilings, small room, is completely soundproofed just by using these, my recordings are crystal clear, they're super effective.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Some of the panels were damaged when I took them out of the package. I've tried several type of ways to attach them to the wall and nothing seems to be effective. The panels seem to be disintegrating and falling apart as if they were very old even though I just purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price :) I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It actually inflates way faster than what it says but just to be safe do what it says. It looked like this after an hour or two so. It’s actually not that and quality considering the price and the fact that guitar center charges like $40 for 3 pieces 😂 anyways it’s a good buy :) worth the price tbh. Any negative comments were most likely just people who expected way more and that’s just their fault 🤷🏽‍♂️.
customer_reviews.author: reyna justino

customer_reviews.title: These look great .... seemingly will work.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. They came on time, and I like the look and feel. I'm giving this 5 stars to make sure that everyone knows my issue isn't with the product itself. I would like someone to show how they manage to keep these on the wall. I heard about double sided tape, and I've tried some of the best tape on the market. It won't stay though. If anyone can help, lemme know. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Does Nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Even after allowing the product to expand, it's very generous to say that it's 1", at its thickest point. Decibel reduction was nil. Seriously. I didn't think that was possible, but it did not register a change on the meter. Spend more money and get real acoustic panels.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Chad

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The panels are bit smaller than 1 foot by 1/4in and not exactly a inch thick but they look great and help with sound dampening, I am happy with the purchase overall, but I would personally buy the thicker panels if I bought more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Barrett

customer_reviews.title: 73 to 33 decibels
customer_reviews.text: I used thumb tacks to get these to stay on the wall and my desk. Command strips were an epic fail. With this, carpets, and weatherstripping tape on my doors, I was able to reduce my study room (right next to family room with Tv) volume from 73 to 33 decibels. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Prod_Doc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE-DO NOT EXPECT RESOUNDING RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE-DO NOT EXPECT RESOUNDING RESULTS! THIS FOAM IS ONLY ONE INCH THICK! PERFECT FOR REDUCING REFLECTIONS AND FLUTTER ECHOES-"NO SOUND DEADENING" IT IS STILL A GREAT ABSORPTIVE APPLICATION...
customer_reviews.author: ACravalho

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors and slight sound improvement for the price
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing with surprisingly some sound clarity improvement. Did have to run a few underwater in order to fully expand them which was noted in the instructions and not a problem for me. If you are looking to buy some foam to compliment your color theme then you found them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Still have to use backing. Not worth the hassle. Consider only if you need to use now but will be upgrading in the near future. Otherwise, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small room (like a booth), not good for large rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Very light foam, but if your trying to reduce a little bit of echo in a small room I think they're great. Large room and you probably won't have a noticeable difference. They come compressed and sealed. That's pretty neat, but it's been over 48 hours now, and other than the test one I went and wetted then wrang out, most of the others still have crimped in corners.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions and packaged well. These work great and I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Coool Item
customer_reviews.text: This Item Is Super Cool For Blocking Your Sound; I Brought It And It Has Worked Wonders. Yes You Will Still Have To Buy Panel For It To Help Block Waves Escape; But Yes It Is A Go For The Buy Of Must Have It.
customer_reviews.author: Young TiBay

customer_reviews.title: Meh?
customer_reviews.text: Flimsey. Not enough mass to seriously effect sound. A curtain might work as well
customer_reviews.author: P. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for soundproofing I just wanted the look. Best price for what you get here. I stapled them so I can't speak to the adhesion. Fairly simple to put up though. They were all pretty much the same size (within 1/8") so it looks symmetric.
customer_reviews.author: adam logan

customer_reviews.title: reduced echo in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: product works great. Just get some double stick tape to attach to the walls. The colors also added a nice motif to the room as well. It feels like the room is quieter overall as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, would work as a top layer.
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin acoustic panels. It would probably be useful for going on top of another kind of acoustic foam. On their own I don’t expect them to do much good.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy not effective
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and light foam. With 2 packs this affected the speaker tuning by less than .4 db using denon audissey.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Decent but noticeably cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Works for what it is, definitely cheaply made as they're pretty thin and also pretty uneven in their cut. Some have much thicker edges than others. But overall they're good!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stream

customer_reviews.title: great as wall decor, don't expect a massive difference in noise pollution
customer_reviews.text: work great as an appealing and somewhat functional wall decor option, and a good price for the number of panels you get. they don't do an amazing job of absorbing sound but if you do any research on these types of things you should know not to expect that with these.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Ceniviva

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound proof panels
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and good quality acoustics panels. Adhesion is something you have to do yourself but very satisfied with the panels. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Realm46 and for you!
customer_reviews.text: Work fantastic for our podcast room. Nullified the echo quite a bit and helped stop noise from outside the room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but some sizes of the panels are not 12"
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box they came to full size rather quickly. I placed them all on 12" x 12" cardboard for better placement / adhesive. They are pretty flimsy but they work for what i was looking in my temporary setup. The only reason i am giving these a lower star level is because it states that they are 12" x 12" which is true for the black.... but all the blues were about 11.50" which made the placements kind of rough lookin in my eyes. I will definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rance Nichols

customer_reviews.title: don't soak it like i did
customer_reviews.text: when you get it don't panic there are 24 compressed to the size of a book.. yes i said book. remove the plastic and let it expand over 48 hours. don't soak it like i did.
customer_reviews.author: Joezombi74

customer_reviews.title: Not self adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I had to use cardstock panels and command strips to get these mounted but they have stopped all reverb in my recording space
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I mean Ok
customer_reviews.text: I am actually somewhat impressed. I have these in my bedroom and they do a little bit better of a job than they are put out to be. For the money they are really nice. NOT SOUNDPROOF but acoustic treated the room nicely. I will definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Heath

customer_reviews.title: Coffee styled walls
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors as well as the cat who i gotta pry off them sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Saldana

customer_reviews.title: As expected, good value, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, definitely do the job, perfect product to insulate editing & sound studio. Easy order process! Thanks. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: They come vacuum packed and the information packet says to allow 48 hours for them to fully decompress before using. I wish I had known that ahead of time. Other than that though, nothing fancy or difficult. You order the foam, you get the foam, it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: David Shields

customer_reviews.title: I use these in my studio.
customer_reviews.text: Standard acoustic panels used in my studio to help control echo. I was very pleased at this value solution to an audio issue.
customer_reviews.author: The Voice of Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not really soundproof and it doesn't stick well
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy command strips and try to stick it, it will fall off eventually. Use gorilla glue / Elmer's glue and stick it on a piece of cardboard or construction paper instead!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Cheong

customer_reviews.title: use this in my Studio for The Kre8ive podcast
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my studio on the kre8ive podcast and they work great, def silences the room and allows me to record efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Camarena

customer_reviews.title: could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: Some panels have a rouge cut that is about halfway through the backside about a half inch deep close to one of the edges. so I assume the machine cutting these probably needs a new blade or some adjusting but over all their decent, but could always be a bit cheaper in price though!
customer_reviews.author: Ldminc

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and very well packaged, good source for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos González C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your great customer service! These panels are so cute
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Dont be worried about the small box!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought UPS only dropped off one a several packages because the package I reciaved was so small. But no, they just vacuum packed the foam which immediately sprang back to life upon opening. And I recieved the package three days early! I will be ordering some more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: The price is worth it i guess
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 24 pcs and it came very very compressed , it came with a note that says they’ll come back to normal in 24 - 48 hours , but it didnt , so i soaked them in water and then i put them in the dryer and they came out REALLY GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Cris Tian

customer_reviews.title: Nothing need to know
customer_reviews.text: Not working well, still can hear a lot sound i don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Use a glue for this product, not a double sided tape or a wall stick.
customer_reviews.text: Foam is foam. However, this foam doesn’t stick to the adhesive recommended by amazon for this product. The foam is shrunk when it comes in the package (awesome way to conserve space), but when they’re back in their original shape, they don’t like adhesives.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Razavi

customer_reviews.title: Works great in Home Theater!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price! Easy to install with Command poster strips. Significant sound difference after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V. Quichocho

customer_reviews.title: They help reduce sound bounce, but tricky to attach to the wall
customer_reviews.text: These do a good minimal job of keeping reflected sound from bouncing too loudly in an amateur studio. They don't attach easily to the wall. The trick to attaching them to the walls is to use a 200 strength spray adhesive to attach four small squares of cardboard to the foam. Then, once dry, use a Command removable sticky strip (available at your local big box store) on each square to attach them to the wall. I had pretty good success with this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Aune

customer_reviews.title: Works nice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a nice pack to cover a portion of the wall. Works amazing and will most likely ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used these as decor, that also keeps down he echo in a 12x15 waiting room
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted. They’re great!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. Way better than I was expecting them to. I dampen the echo in a small room so I could record videos. Now the acoustics are so good I practice guitar in there.
customer_reviews.author: NatLawson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It came well packed and sealed. Still lasting amd does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbency for price. No deformity.
customer_reviews.text: The absorption of these is pretty decent for the price. Also the foam kept it's form well. Literally after 30 minutes after opening the vacuum sealed pack the foam was back to shape. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: bernardw

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: They do the job, thin but look great! They Don’t take that long to un- compress
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Great Look!
customer_reviews.text: I love acoustic panels. I have over 50 in my studio. Everyone always asks if they make a difference and I always answer yes, and show them the difference in quality in the videos I make.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Since it was a gift, I don't know much about it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the cost
customer_reviews.text: They aren't that thick but they make a surprising difference in the noise level of the room. Probably about a 20-30% reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Took a day to re-inflate... Work great for keeping our rehearsal space quieter
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Save your time and money - don't by this products. It says "soak in water and it will work fine". What a joke! The tiles are cut; they are not even. Waster of time. No replacement is needed - REFUND! Good thing that I bought only one pack to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay I don't hear my neighbors screwing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I don't have to hear my neighbors screw, fart, sneeze, and argue. Great product just wish they had bigger size packages to buy. The largest one is the 24 pack in blue and black.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These panels are great! They do a great job at removing reflections.
customer_reviews.author: WhosTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Small package
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in air tight bag compressed, have to give it a hour or two before use
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great! I see no problems at all really. I mean some are a little bent but you could just steam it out if you really care that much :) youtube: YeoYolo
customer_reviews.author: slate j

customer_reviews.title: Changes Color Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Had them for a week and they turned yellow on me. Looks like a swampy torquoise now.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Acoustic Alchemy
customer_reviews.text: These panels took out all my reverberations in my rectangle room being used as a recording studio. What more is there to say? Thanx! Kevin
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Jus ok
customer_reviews.text: They work, but you need so many of them. It may not be worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to stick
customer_reviews.text: Hard to stick but once I figure that out they will serve the purpose, more for looks in teens gaming room
customer_reviews.author: HAS

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes vacuum sealed. Black ones reshaped perfectly in a few days, but the red ones never fully reshaped, side left a bit deformed. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vanhaverbeke

customer_reviews.title: Did very little, if anything, to absorb the sound in my room
customer_reviews.text: I lined the walls of my study with these. I do video-based work from home. The pads did virtually nothing to make the room echo less. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: twocut

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning to other buyers. These are SUPER thin. They do not expand very much at all. They're like an inch thick max. And at one inch they're barely absorbing sound
customer_reviews.author: michael snyder

customer_reviews.title: Sounds pretty HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Panels works well. Depending on the size of the room I’d suggest ordering 2 of the 24 packs to start off. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Missejackson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine is crumbling apart I have never seen such foam do this maybe the bundle they sent me got set or something idk but I hope they re ship me another
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for what I needed them for. I needed to cancel high end reflection in the studio and these worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To thin, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Foam was to thin, not sound proof, no instructions for application.
customer_reviews.author: esmer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for the price. 24 didnt fill my whole office however they did make a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Doane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal and these worked wonders at stopping the echo when I record.
customer_reviews.author: Defcon1

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This is piece of junk, my kitchen sponge denser than this thing. Absolutley not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Martun Davoyan

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out the sun good
customer_reviews.text: I work graveyards and having the sun peak through my window was annoying when trying to sleep but since I have these I can’t even tell that it’s daytime unless I check my phone
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: 👌👌
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 for my studio and it works great 👌
customer_reviews.author: Nikolus Lang

customer_reviews.title: Used in a video/audio studio for young people
customer_reviews.text: These are great but had a tendency to fall off the wall. Need good plan for attaching them.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This product was very good bounced sound waves like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works ok for a teenager gaming and yelling... small noticable noise reduction from downstairs haha
customer_reviews.author: Weave

customer_reviews.title: Never retained shape.
customer_reviews.text: For 85 cents worth of polyfoam, this $35 pile of tile should have regained a linear shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for my green and black setup, they work amazing definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: braidon harper

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that is very simple to use and put on the wol or sealing. Used it for home studio.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Kirchev

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked more density to the foam
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a bit more density to the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Poo poo
customer_reviews.text: Decorative crap waste of money. Garbage. I might as well use egg cartons
customer_reviews.author: Heyooodudeguy

customer_reviews.title: Love these tiles! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 24 to start bc I was skeptical. Ended up buying 48 more. Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: They are not very dense but they do their job well ... without counting on the good price for 24 pieces
customer_reviews.author: alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Bad order
customer_reviews.text: This not rhe same green i order the first time..my studio about to look tacky...i want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, literally bought 4 sets of the panels. My only issue with the panels are that there is a thicker bezel at the bottom, so orientation matters
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hornung

customer_reviews.title: Buy adhesives too
customer_reviews.text: No adhesives come with it. Only certain adhesive products work. But great looks and works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This isn't as home studio friendly as other brands.
customer_reviews.text: It was way too heavy. Annoying to use, The product seemed good quality however.
customer_reviews.author: Yukio

product_meta.title: 24 Pack- Black/Red Acoustic Panels Studio Foam Wedges 1" X 12" X 12" (24PCS, Black&Red)
product_meta.description:
Size:24PCS| Color:Black&Red Professional Studio Grade Acoustical Treatments, Create Beautiful Recording Enviroments! 

 Acoustic foam is used to remove reverberation and sound reflections, provide sound insulation industrial and domestic applications suitable for sound studios. Unlike polyurethane foam, fiberglass and rock wool have health risks. 
This product can be used as acoustic cover for walls, ceilings and doors and other various places such as theaters or movie theaters, recording studios, and other busy and crowded places such as gyms, subways, stations, offices, schools, and other areas. 
This product is great for voice and video recording. 
Burdurry Acoustics (wedges, eggcrates, pyramids) are effective sound deadener for standing waves and flutter echoes, especially when used with our corner bass traps and corner blocks. 
It also reduces slap-back and room ring when used in medium-sized areas like isolation booths, recording booths, control rooms, and sound studios. 
Use for decoration or professional applications 

 This foam is ideal for spot-treating production studios, practice rooms or home entertainment centers. Also, this foam helps with smaller agitation echo complications. 
For decorateive purpuses, wedges, eggcrates and pyramids can also be arranged side-by-side with the acoustic bass traps, corner bass traps triamp and other bass acoustic foam. 
How much space does one tile cover? 

 1" X 12" X 12" Acoustic Panel Studio Foam Wedges are 1 inch in thick and covering 1 square foot. 
If you purchase a 12 Pack of 1" X 12" X 12", that would cover 12 square feet. 
If you purchase a 24 Pack of 1" X 12" X 12", that would cover 24 square feet. And so on.. 
Foam will not deteriorate or fall apart over time. All that is required is dusting over long periods of time.
feature_bullets: 12 Pack covers 12 square feet - Each tile is 1 square foot of 1 inch thick acoustic wedge
For use in home theaters, professional movie theaters, concert halls, gymnasiums sports centers, recording studios, auditoriums and more!
Professional, High Quality Durability and Effective
Dampens and diffuses mid to low frequency sound waves inside of a room to minimize interference, Increases increasing sound clarity
